location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire] to William Simson, Acting Secretary to the Government, Persian Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of items from Bombay, which were sent in response to an application from the Resident to meet his requirement to present diplomatic gifts in the course of his work.
